data.name: Gulf Coast Code Camp 2020
data.location: Shelby Hall, University of South Alabama
data.description: Mobile is hosting a Code Camp at the University of South Alabama on August 8th 2020! This is a FREE, one day event with 16 speakers! We’ll be covering Web Development, Cloud Development, Database and Emerging Tech. Lunch will be provided and there will be a social off site at the en…

relatedRecords.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
relatedRecords.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.
